#summary Isolator Development Board for the ADuMx4xx, Si844x, or ISO724x

This board is still under development.

The relevant [http://www.lis.inpg.fr/realise_au_lis/kicad/ KiCAD] design files can be found through [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/source/checkout SVN] in the `/Current_Designs/Isolator/` directory.

A PCB of this design can be purchased at cost through [http://batchpcb.com/index.php/Products/44028 BatchPCB].
